post.text: I stand for ALL AMERICANS! Deplorables, basement dwellers, I stand for ALL of YOU!

comment.author: Keven
comment.text: Wow. Just WOW. This moderator keeps jumping down Pence's throat for barley interrupting. But let's this Hillary Puke VP hopeful say as much as he wants. Whenever he wants to say it. And the moderator is actually helping him do it. If you are a Hillary supporter and you can't see what is going on here, I feel very sorry for you. I'm trying to be very open minded, but this is rediculous.

replies.author: Jordan
replies.text: Coleman , coming from the guy saying "Waaaaah waaaah lmfao." Like you have never made a typing error before. Typical liberal just attacking other americans.
